title: It’s Funny When You Realize It
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Aw man~, it looks like the train is running late.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah, but how late is it going to be? If it’s too long of a delay, we won’t be able to make it to μ’s’ live....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Nah, it’s fine. Even if it’s late, it will only be around 5 minutes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank goodness. Let’s wait for some time then, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>But the fact that we can stay calm even if the train schedule diagram is in disarray is one of the good things about Japan, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>....Ahahaha!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh, huh? Did I say something weird!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, no no! Dia is worried because the Dia-gram is in disarray, just kidding!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>....That’s very like you to spot that, Ai-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
